original_title: Dr. Pimple Popper: With Every Cyst-mas Card I Write
overview: Christmas is in full swing at Dr. Pimple Popper HQ with patients galore, but this year, Dr. Lee and her staff are partaking in a merry task to re-create classic Christmas movie scenes with pimple-y twists for holiday cards for their patients.
title: Dr. Pimple Popper: With Every Cyst-mas Card I Write
